
Health Check
==================

curl "http://127.0.0.1:30081/health"


List
================

With namespace:
--------------

curl --silent \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE" \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/list?category=pods&ns=demo-system"

Without namespace:
------------------

curl --silent \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${ACCESS_TOKEN}" \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/list?category=pods"


Call (GET example)
===============================

curl -v -G \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${KRATEO_TOKEN}" \
  -d "apiVersion=widgets.templates.krateo.io/v1beta1" \
  -d "resource=buttons" \
  -d "namespace=demo-system" \
  -d "name=button-sample" \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/call"

 curl -v -G GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${KRATEO_TOKEN}" \
  -d 'apiVersion=widgets.templates.krateo.io/v1beta1' \
  -d 'resource=buttons' \    
  -d 'namespace=demo-system' \
  -d 'name=button-with-actions' \
  -d 'per_page=3' -d 'page=1' \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/call" 

 curl -v -G GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${KRATEO_TOKEN}" \
  -d 'apiVersion=widgets.templates.krateo.io/v1beta1' \
  -d 'resource=buttons' \    
  -d 'namespace=demo-system' \
  -d 'name=pagination-demo' \
  -d 'per_page=3' -d 'page=1' \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/call" 


curl -v -G GET \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${KRATEO_TOKEN}" \
  -d 'apiVersion=templates.krateo.io/v1' \
  -d 'resource=restactions' \
  -d 'namespace=demo-system' \
  -d 'name=list-pods' \
  -d 'per_page=3' \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/call"

Call (POST example)
==================

curl -v --request POST \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${ACCESS_TOKEN}" \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d @testdata/pod-sample.json \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/call?apiVersion=apps/v1&namespace=demo-system&resource=deployments&name=nginx"


Call (PATCH example)
====================

curl --trace-ascii - --request PATCH \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${KRATEO_TOKEN}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/merge-patch+json" \
  -d '{"metadata":{"labels":{"environment":"staging"}}}' \
  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/call?apiVersion=templates.krateo.io/v1&namespace=demo-system&resource=restactions&name=list-pods"


curl -v --request PATCH \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer ${KRATEO_TOKEN}" \

  "http://127.0.0.1:30081/call?apiVersion=templates.krateo.io/v1&namespace=demo-system&resource=restactions&name=list-pods"

  "plural": "pods",
  "singular": "pod",
  "shorts": [
    "po"
  ]
}
